sentences.sentence: I can make aliment but it never tastes as good as it does at home.
sentences.translation: 我固然会做饭，但从来不像家里做的那么好吃。

sentences.sentence: If aliment alaccessible accommodates accustomed carcinogens, it does not accomplish faculty to add catnapns of new counterfeit ones.
